targets.query:
import "sampledata"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "D739SENSERTD3")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm1_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "sampledata"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "D739SENSERTD3")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm2_5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "D739SENSERTD3")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "D739SENSERTD3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm1_0")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0 and r._value < 100000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "sampledata"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "D739SENSERTD3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0 and r._value < 100000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm2_5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "sampledata"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "D739SENSERTD3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0 and r._value < 100000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "D739SENSERTD1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
